title: Can we get a Riot ivern skin?
body: Ivern dressed as a cop like trundle or volibear and daisy dressed as a swat or riot cop, maybe have a chopper or police sirens evacuating the jungle creatures from the danger zone.

replies.body: Aw man, I loved working on Ivern so much. I would love for him to get a new skin. Fun fact, when we were brainstorming his Launch skin, one idea we all loved (but couldn't accomplish due to scope) was Alien Abduction Ivern. Instead of "freeing" jungle camps, he would beam them up to his space ship. I hope we get to make that one day.

I am stil pissed off at you guys for giving mf the ultimate skin of this year and when i asked why? no answer at all, not that i expect any reply back here either but i just want to get it off my chest...

wukong or shen would have been 2 very good candidates for the ultimate skin, shen has not had a skin for years... and all of wukongs skins are kind of crappy and sort of look like each other but a little bit different and another colour... (and that radiant wukong is decent but for that price when compared to others of that price range it doesnt even come close to what it could have been...) they both dont even have a legendary while being such old champs and pretty iconic also.
